summary: A few years after his death, the widow of Stanley Kubrick (1928-1999) asks Jon Ronson to look through the contents of about 1,000 boxes of meticulously sorted materials Kubrick left. Ronson... See full summary »
cast: Jon Ronson|Anthony Frewin|Jan Harlan|Christiane Kubrick|Manuel Harlan|Anya Kubrick|Julian Senior|Vincent Tilsley|Rick Senat|Deborah Davis|Judy Tobey|Van Boudreaux|Leon Vitali|Bernd Eichhorn|Vinny Fiorentino|Stanley Kubrick|Terry Needham
title: Las cajas de Stanley Kubrick
